movies.title: The Cabin
movies.plot: A single woman, Laura, meets a nice guy, John, on an online dating site. After a few dates he invites her to his vacation cabin in the mountains. Laura ignores the warnings from her friend, Ashley, about it being too soon to go away with a guy she just met. Once at the secluded cabin, Laura begins to notice strange behavior changes in John. She also begins to be drawn to the crawlspace under the cabin. Is this all in her head, or is there a deeper, darker secret to be uncovered?
movies.simplePlot: A single woman, Laura, meets a nice guy, John, on an online dating site. After a few dates he invites her to his vacation cabin in the mountains. Laura ignores the warnings from her friend,...

biography.bio: Born outside of Chicago on the Great Lakes, Jason grew up a Navy brat and spent the majority of his childhood moving up and down the east coast. His personality is an amalgamation of all of these regions. A street smart city guy with a laid back southern charm. He graduated from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill with an MFA in acting. He lived in New York City for twelve years working in television soaps, regional theater, Off-Off Broadway and eventually Off-Broadway. Jason cut his teeth in indie film while living in NYC which has helped lead him to his current successes in film and T.V. While in NYC he studied with acting instructor Wynn Handman at his Carnegie Hall studio. He has worked in over sixty films of all shapes and sizes and has made dozens TV appearances throughout his twenty plus years in the business.
biography.name: Jason Vail

biography.bio: Morgan Monnig is known for her work on Two Wolves, Two Worlds (2012), Worldly Possessions (2014) and Uncivil (2012).
biography.name: Morgan Monnig

biography.bio: Shelby Washburn is known for her work on The Cabin (2013), Dollface (2014) and Brown Sugar (2013).
biography.name: Shelby Washburn

awards.award: Myrtle Beach International Film Festival, US 2014
